Description.Text: Comwell Roskilde is a modern 3-star hotel offering comfortable accommodation near the centre of Roskilde. Highlights include a gym and free Wi-Fi. Roskilde is an ancient city located on the island of Zealand. Nearby places of interest include Roskilde Cathedral and the Viking Ship Museum. Local bus services provide fast and easy access to other popular Roskilde destinations. The hotel occupies a modern mid-rise property close to the woods and the beach. Facilities include a gym, billiards table, ping-pong table, and terrace overlooking Roskilde Fjord. Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the premises. Standard rooms are 13sqm and decorated in a bright contemporary style with charming artwork. Amenities include a flat-screen TV with on-demand content, radio and work desk. The en-suite bathrooms feature a walk-in shower. The restaurant offers delicious modern regional and international dishes in a sleek and sophisticated setting. Guests can enjoy a range of drinks at the hotel bar. Free parking is possible onsite. The hotel has a 24-hour reception.
